text: Rory Elizabeth Katherine Kennedy (born December 12, 1968) is an American documentary filmmaker. Kennedy has made documentary movies that are about social issues like addiction, opposition to nuclear power, the treatment of prisoners-of-war, and the politics of the Mexicoâ€“United States border. She is the youngest child of U.S. Senator Robert F. Kennedy and Ethel Kennedy. She was born six months after her father was shot and killed. She is a niece of former U.S. President John F. Kennedy and former U.S. Senator Ted Kennedy. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Writers from Washington, D.C. title: Rory Kennedy
